<cs> my lords i have to confess to having some sense of guilt because this is the first occasion on which i have spoken in your lordships house <e> <s> as some of your lordships will know i have had the option to do so for a little time now <e> <s> i am not sure therefore whether i have the right to ask for your lordships indulgence but nevertheless i would like if i may to do so <e>
